Subroutine transpmodel

  1 :       subroutine transpmodel(invar, dim_invar, nrun, netass, option1)
  2 : !***********************************************************************
  3 : !*  Transpiration model and layered water balance
  4 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
  5 : !*  Author: Stan Schymanski, CWR, University of Western Australia
  6 : !*  03/2006
  7 : !*  now at: Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry
  8 : !*  Email: sschym@bgc-jena.mpg.de
  9 : !*  02/2008
 10 : !*  Version: big leaf, trees and grass, layered unsaturated zone
 11 : !*  optimised root profile, pcg and Jmax25
 12 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
 13 : !*
 14 : !* Numbers in the commented parentheses refer to the equation numeration
 15 : !* in Schymanski (2007): PhD thesis, University of W.A. 
 16 : !* and in the document 'equations.pdf' that comes with the documentation.
 17 : !*
 18 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19 : !*  Copyright (C) 2008  Stan Schymanski
 20 : !*
 21 : !*    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 22 : !*    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 23 : !*    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 24 : !*    (at your option) any later version.
 25 : !*
 26 : !*    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 27 : !*    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 28 : !*    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 29 : !*    GNU General Public License for more details.
 30 : !*
 31 : !*    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 32 : !*    along with this program.  If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses.
 33 : !*
 34 : !***********************************************************************
 35 : 
 36 :       use vegmod
 37 :       use vegwatmod
 38 :       implicit none
 39 : 
 40 :       INTEGER, INTENT(in)    :: dim_invar
 41 :       INTEGER, INTENT(in)    :: nrun
 42 :       REAL*8,  INTENT(inout) :: netass
 43 :       INTEGER, INTENT(in)    :: option1
 44 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(dim_invar), INTENT(in) :: invar
 45 : 
 46 :       INTEGER :: finish
 47 : 
 48 :       finish = 0
 49 : 
 50 : !dd      if (dim_invar .lt. 8) then
 51 :       if (dim_invar .lt. 6) then
 52 :         write(*,*) "ERROR: Number of input parameters less than 6."
 53 :         stop
 54 :       endif
 55 : 
 56 :       netass = 0.d0
 57 : 
 58 :       if (option1 .eq. 2) then
 59 :         optmode = 0
 60 :       else
 61 :         optmode = 1
 62 :       endif
 63 :     
 64 :       if (option1 .eq. 3) optmode = 2
 65 : 
 66 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
 67 : !*     Optimised parameters reading from invar
 68 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
 69 : 
 70 :       lambdagfac = invar(1)
 71 :       wsgexp     = invar(2)
 72 :       lambdafac  = invar(3)
 73 :       wsexp      = invar(4)
 74 :       pc_        = invar(5)
 75 :       rootdepth  = invar(6)
 76 : !dd      mdstore    = invar(7)
 77 : !dd      rgdepth    = invar(8)
 78 : 
 79 :       if (parsaved .ne. 1) then
 80 : 
 81 : !*-----Reading input parameter------------------------------------------
 82 : 
 83 :         call vom_read_input()
 84 : 
 85 : !*-----allocate vector sizes--------------------------------------------
 86 : 
 87 :         call vom_alloc()
 88 : 
 89 : !*-----File opening (saving climate and gstom ass data)-----------------
 90 : 
 91 :         if (optmode .eq. 0) call vom_open_output()
 92 :     
 93 :         if (optmode .eq. 2) call vom_open_ncp_output()
 94 : 
 95 : !*-----PARAMETER READING FROM SOILPROFILE.PAR---------------------------
 96 : 
 97 :         call vom_get_soilprofile()
 98 : 
 99 : !*-----Climate and Calendar data reading--------------------------------
100 : 
101 :         call vom_get_hourly_clim()
102 : 
103 :         parsaved = 1 
104 :       endif
105 : 
106 : !***********************************************************************
107 : !*  Calculation of vegetation parameters
108 : !*
109 : !*----------------------------------------------------------------------
110 : !*  Equations in equations.pdf
111 : !*  (numeration in the commented parentheses)
112 : !***********************************************************************
113 : 
114 : !*-----Initial values---------------------------------------------------
115 : 
116 :       call vom_init_vegpar()
117 : 
118 : !*-----DAILY LOOPS------------------------------------------------------
119 : 
120 :       d___ = 0
121 :       dtest = nyt * 365
122 :       if (optmode .eq. 0 .or. optmode .eq. 2) dtest = N__
123 :       do while (d___  .lt. dtest)
124 :         d___ = d___ + 1
125 : 
126 :         call vom_daily_init()
127 : 
128 : !*-----HOURLY LOOPS-----------------------------------------------------
129 : 
130 : !       * loops through each hour of daily dataset
131 :         do h__ = 1, 24
132 : 
133 :           call vom_hourly_init()
134 : 
135 : !*-----calculate gstom, et and ass--------------------------------------
136 : 
137 :           call vom_gstom()
138 : 
139 : !*-----SUB-HOURLY LOOPS-------------------------------------------------
140 : 
141 :           do while (time .lt. 3600.d0)
142 : 
143 : !*-----setting variables from previous loop-----------------------------
144 : 
145 :             call vom_subhourly_init()
146 : 
147 : !*-----root water uptake------------------------------------------------
148 : 
149 :             call vom_rootuptake()
150 : 
151 :             if (md_ .gt. 0.d0) then
152 : 
153 : !*-----steady-state tissue water (mqss)---------------------------------
154 : 
155 :               if (nlayers_ .ge. 1) then
156 :                 call vom_mqss(mqss_)
157 :               else
158 :                 mqss_ = 0.9d0 * mqx_
159 :               endif
160 :               mqssmin = MIN(mqssmin,mqss_)
161 :             
162 : !*-----transpiration, gstom and tissue water----------------------------
163 : 
164 :               call vom_tissue_water_et(finish, netass)
165 :               if (finish .eq. 1) return
166 :             endif
167 : 
168 : !*-----water balance and conditions at next time step-------------------
169 : 
170 :             call vom_subhourly()
171 : 
172 :             time = time + dt_
173 :             mqnew = mq_ + dmq * dt_
174 : 
175 : !*-----adding up hourly fluxes------------------------------------------
176 : 
177 :             call vom_add_hourly()
178 : 
179 : !*-----END OF HOUR------------------------------------------------------
180 : 
181 :           enddo
182 : 
183 : !         * rl does not need to be included here as ass=-rl if j=0 (at night)
184 :           netass = netass + hass_(2) - 3600.d0 * (cpcc_ + rr_ + tc_)   &
185 :      &           + hassg(2,2) - 3600.d0 * (cpccg(2) + rrg + tcg(2))
186 :           ass_d(:) = ass_d(:) + hass_(:)
187 :           assg_d(:,:) = assg_d(:,:) + hassg(:,:)
188 :           ruptkvec_d(:) = ruptkvec_d(:) + hruptkvec(:)
189 :           ruptkg_d(:) = ruptkg_d(:) + hruptkg(:)
190 : 
191 :           if (optmode .eq. 0) then
192 : 
193 :             call vom_add_daily()
194 :             call vom_write_hourly()
195 : 
196 : !*-----check water balance----------------------------------------------
197 : 
198 :             call vom_check_water(finish)
199 :             if (finish .eq. 1) return
200 : 
201 :           endif
202 :         enddo
203 : 
204 : !*-----END OF DAY-------------------------------------------------------
205 : 
206 :         if (optmode .eq. 0) then
207 :           call vom_write_dayyear()
208 :       call vom_add_yearly()
209 :     endif
210 : 
211 : !*-----ADJUSTMENT OF JMAX25 and PC--------------------------------------
212 : 
213 :         call vom_adapt_foliage()
214 : 
215 : !*-----ADJUSTMENT OF ROOT SURFACE---------------------------------------
216 : 
217 :         call vom_adapt_roots()
218 : 
219 :         if ((d___ .eq. dtest) .and. (d___ .lt. N__)) then
220 :           if (netass .le. 0.d0) then
221 : !           * estimates how bad the carbon loss would be instead of
222 : !             running through the whole set
223 :             netass = netass / nyt * ny_
224 :           else
225 :             dtest = N__
226 :           endif
227 :         endif
228 : 
229 :       enddo
230 : 
231 : !*-----END OF DAILY LOOPS-----------------------------------------------
232 : 
233 :       if (optmode .eq. 0) then
234 :         print *,"Cumulative error in water balance (initial Ws+Input-Output-final Ws, in m): ",error
235 :         print *,"Number of times dtsu was limiting: ",dtsu_count
236 :         print *,"Number of times dtmax was limiting: ",dtmax_count
237 :         close(kfile_resultshourly)
238 :         close(kfile_resultsdaily)
239 :         close(kfile_yearly)
240 :         close(kfile_rsurfdaily)
241 :         close(kfile_delyuhourly)
242 :         close(kfile_ruptkhourly)
243 :         close(kfile_suvechourly)
244 :       endif
245 :     
246 :       if (optmode .eq. 2) then
247 :         call vom_write_model_output(netass)
248 :         close(kfile_model_output)
249 :       endif
250 : 
251 :       return
252 :       end subroutine transpmodel
